Text.val: 16.01.2013 GB SCR17843 Changed test for Create FM04 and Create FCMT
12.10.2012 SH SCR17574 Changed Blob Ansi to Unicode blob (FCMT)
29.05.2012 JH SCR17269 Added update of new fields FCMH_ADMNO, FCMH_CLNTNO and FCMH_DEBH_NO
17.04.2009 SH SCR14556 Extended CCRY selection with main legal client if no rows
25.11.2008 SH SCR14148 Added CCRY601_INSURANCECOMMPERC to calc the percentages

SQL_STMT_U.val: select a.CCRY308_ADMNO, a.CCRY308_CLNTNO, a.CCRY308_COUNTRY, max(a.CCRY601_COMMISSIONPERC + a.CCRY601_COMMISSIONCMPERC + a.CCRY601_INSURANCECOMMPERC) as MaxPerc from :1/CCRY a where a.CCRY308_ADMNO = :2 and a.CCRY308_CLNTNO = :3 and not(exists(select * from :1/CCRY where CCRY308_ADMNO = :4 and CCRY308_CLNTNO = :5 and CCRY308_COUNTRY = a.CCRY308_COUNTRY)) group by a.CCRY308_ADMNO, a.CCRY308_CLNTNO, a.CCRY308_COUNTRY order by MaxPerc Desc

select CCRY308_ADMNO, CCRY308_CLNTNO, CCRY308_COUNTRY, CCRY601_COMMISSIONPERC, CCRY601_COMMISSIONAMOUNT, CCRY601_INSURANCECOMMPERC, CCRY601_COMMISSIONCMPERC from :1/CCRY where CCRY308_ADMNO = :2 and CCRY308_CLNTNO = :3 and (CCRY601_COMMISSIONPERC > 0 or CCRY601_COMMISSIONCMPERC > 0 or CCRY601_INSURANCECOMMPERC > 0 or CCRY601_COMMISSIONAMOUNT > 0) and ((CCRY601_COMMISSIONPERC + CCRY601_COMMISSIONCMPERC + CCRY601_INSURANCECOMMPERC) <> :4 or CCRY601_COMMISSIONAMOUNT <> :5)
UNION
select a.CCRY308_ADMNO, a.CCRY308_CLNTNO, a.CCRY308_COUNTRY, a.CCRY601_COMMISSIONPERC, a.CCRY601_COMMISSIONAMOUNT, a.CCRY601_INSURANCECOMMPERC, a.CCRY601_COMMISSIONCMPERC from :1/CCRY a where a.CCRY308_ADMNO = :6 and a.CCRY308_CLNTNO = :7 and (a.CCRY601_COMMISSIONPERC > 0 or a.CCRY601_COMMISSIONCMPERC > 0 or a.CCRY601_INSURANCECOMMPERC > 0 or a.CCRY601_COMMISSIONAMOUNT > 0) and ((a.CCRY601_COMMISSIONPERC + a.CCRY601_COMMISSIONCMPERC + a.CCRY601_INSURANCECOMMPERC) <> :4 or a.CCRY601_COMMISSIONAMOUNT <> :5) and not(exists(select * from :1/CCRY where CCRY308_ADMNO = :2 and CCRY308_CLNTNO = :3 and CCRY308_COUNTRY = a.CCRY308_COUNTRY))

Text.val: ... max.10 CCRY strings are written to FCMT_MESSAGE_TEXT
... from UTF-16 LE to UTF-16 BE
... from UTF-16 BE to UTF-16 LE
